description: Provides details about the Shield Advanced subscription for an account.

nested_items.name: Subscription
nested_items.description: The Shield Advanced subscription details for an account.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The start time of the subscription, in Unix time in seconds.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The date and time your subscription will end.

nested_items.name: TimeCommitmentInSeconds
nested_items.description: The length, in seconds, of the Shield Advanced subscription for the account.

nested_items.name: AutoRenew
nested_items.description: If ENABLED, the subscription will be automatically renewed at the end of the existing subscription period.

nested_items.name: Limits
nested_items.description: Specifies how many protections of a given type you can create.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of protection.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum number of protections that can be created for the specified Type.

nested_items.name: ProactiveEngagementStatus
nested_items.description: If ENABLED, the Shield Response Team (SRT) will use email and phone to notify contacts about escalations to the SRT and to initiate proactive customer support.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionLimits
nested_items.description: Limits settings for your subscription.

nested_items.name: ProtectionLimits
nested_items.description: Limits settings on protections for your subscription.

nested_items.name: ProtectedResourceTypeLimits
nested_items.description: The maximum number of resource types that you can specify in a protection.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The type of protection.

nested_items.name: Max
nested_items.description: The maximum number of protections that can be created for the specified Type.

nested_items.name: ProtectionGroupLimits
nested_items.description: Limits settings on protection groups for your subscription.

nested_items.name: MaxProtectionGroups
nested_items.description: The maximum number of protection groups that you can have at one time.

nested_items.name: PatternTypeLimits
nested_items.description: Limits settings by pattern type in the protection groups for your subscription.

nested_items.name: ArbitraryPatternLimits
nested_items.description: Limits settings on protection groups with arbitrary pattern type.

nested_items.name: MaxMembers
nested_items.description: The maximum number of resources you can specify for a single arbitrary pattern in a protection group.

nested_items.name: SubscriptionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the subscription.
